meanings.definition: To feel sorrow or regret for
meanings.sent1: She will rue missing the bus.
meanings.sent2: I rue not studying for the test.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't help but rue his forgetfulness.
meanings.sent4: The decision to quit his job made him rue the consequences.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lost puppy made her rue not adopting it.

meanings.sent1: They will rue their harsh words later.
meanings.sent2: She will rue her impulsive purchase.
meanings.sent4: The chef will rue using too much salt in the dish.
meanings.sent5: The driver will rue ignoring the warning signs.

meanings.definition: A feeling of regret or sorrow
meanings.sent1: Regret and rue filled her heart.
meanings.sent2: His face showed deep rue after the loss.
meanings.sent3: The room was heavy with the guests' rue.
meanings.sent4: The painting evoked a sense of rue in the viewers.
meanings.sent5: The play left the audience with a lingering sense of rue.
